// DirectIPNotAllowed.js import React from 'react'; import './DirectIPNotAllowed.css'; // Import custom CSS file for styling function DirectIPNotAllowed() { const clientIP = '152.58.196.248'; // Replace this with the actual client IP address const currentTime = new Date().toUTCString(); return (

Error 1003

Direct IP access not allowed

What happened?

You've requested an IP address directly. Direct IP access is not allowed.

What can I do?

If you are interested in accessing this website, please use the correct domain name.

Client IP: {clientIP}

Current Time (UTC): {currentTime}

Performance & security by rachakondadharmendra.info

); } export default DirectIPNotAllowed;
